title: An introduction to Practical, ethical and theoretical factors (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, we continue understanding research methods and look at PETs - The practical, ethical and theoretical issues that sociologists must consider before and during their research. This also covers some key studies that help to understand the issues of PETs.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
